## Checklist

### General

- [ ] My code follows the project's coding standards
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings

### Testing

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have verified the app works on GrapheneOS (if applicable)

### Security & Privacy

- [ ] I have not hardcoded any secrets, API keys, or credentials
- [ ] I have used EncryptedSharedPreferences for sensitive data storage
- [ ] I have validated all user inputs
- [ ] My changes work offline (when applicable)
- [ ] I have not added any analytics or tracking

### Android Specific

- [ ] I have used signature-level permissions for IPC components
- [ ] I have not used GlobalScope for coroutines
- [ ] I have tested on Android 9+ (API 28+)
